text: The Book of Life is a 2014 animated romantic comedy movie. This movie is about being torn between family expectations and following the heart of one. Christina Applegate plays teacher Mary Beth. Ice Cube plays a Candle Maker. Channing Tatum plays Tatum. The movie was released on October 17, 2014. == Reference == Category:2014 animated movies Category:2014 romantic comedy movies Category:American animated movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Halloween movies
title: The Book of Life (movie)
